input.sentences: flying on a jet plane to a new city .
a city filled with amazing sights .
sometimes things can be a little boring .
sometimes there are things about a new city that make you want to scream .
the best part of a trip sometimes is heading back home .
output.sentences: The plane was flying like a jet.
The city was filled with hundreds of sights.
Since we were bored, we took a lot of pictures.
While in the city, we could hear a scream.
After the trip, we started heading home.
